entry.title: Not Just An NDA
entry.summary:
Author: ApparentlyStray

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,994Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 12

Summary: At some point during the show, Rose had bumped Chris's shoulder and apologized. Not much later, while keeping his eyes focused on the stage, Chris reached his hand out and touched Rose’s hand, hoping it came off as an accident. Rose froze when she felt his hand against her own. He definitely lingered more than an accidental bump. Swallowing, Rose extended her fingers and grazed Chris's hand. Rose was still having a hard time wrapping her mind around the fact that these world famous K-Pop idols were the ones to reach out to her. There were already a bunch of what ifs forming in Rose’s mind. Rose had spent the better part of the past few years obsessed with the man beside her and his group. How could she do anything, but take the chance and get to know them.   This is my first fic on AO3 and my first SKZ fic. It started as a "what if" and one shots bounced around with friends, but I decided to actually post it after being told to write it down. This fic will focus on Rose (OC)/ Bang Chan's relationship with some other background relationships.

What did I win?”“The competition to become the ‘9th member’ of Stray Kids for a year! This is the letter babe! Oh my god, I need autographs, you have to promise!”I sigh. “Alicia, slow down. I know they’re having this competition, but I didn’t enter, so this literally cannot be real.”“That’s because we entered for you!”Every sound around me suddenly disappears; all I can hear is the thudding pulse in my eardrums. No way. “Wha-what? Who’s we?”“Okay. Remember how I told you this was a special birthday and that you’d never forget your twenty-first?”“Yes…”

entry.title: Sugar
entry.summary:
Author: Changbinsthang

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,746Chapters: 14/15Kudos: 236

Summary: Twenty-eight thousand, six hundred seventy-six dollars and forty-nine cents. That’s how much debt he was in after his tuition balance finally posted. Felix stared at the number, numb. His adrenaline had spiked so fast that now his hands tingled, his stomach twisted hollow, and a cold sweat clung to the back of his neck. He was officially at rock bottom—with absolutely no idea how to climb out. Tears pricked behind his eyes, hot and humiliating. Felix swallowed. And then it came back—that thought. That dangerous, glowing idea that had been flickering in the back of his mind every time he looked at his boss. He’d spent the last week and a half pushing it down. Forcing it down. Trying to bury it beneath professionalism and pride. But what was wrong with…asking? Not that word. Not outright. Just an offer. A proposal. The worst he could do was say no. --- Felix is technically Chris' sugar baby but it's never outright said.
